name: Denitrification Potential (visual)
functionStatement: Nitrogen and phosphorus transformations feed primary production, regulate excess loads, and store or release nutrients.
descriptionMarkdown: Adequate floodplain/wetland pockets for denitrification, consistent with local reference.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Presence of wet pockets / redox mottles

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: No wetlands. Floodplain ditched or tile drained.
Criteria: Negligible potential

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Limited wetland area. Bankfull rarely overtops.
Criteria: Low potential

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Some wet pockets. Channel partly disconnected from floodplain.
Criteria: Moderate potential

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Connected floodplain wetlands with hydric soils and backwater pockets.
Criteria: Strong potential with frequent seasonal saturation
